name: Night Mode
description:
Sam the Stick Insect has just shoplifted a pack of Haribo from Tesco. Get away before you get got!

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Switch - 1-4, Q, E

This game was made for the 2022 Global Game Jam, with the theme "duality". Hope you enjoy! All feedback is appreciated.

Source available at:
https://gitlab.com/SamShepherd/ggj2022.git
